hadiths.text: It was narrated that 'Aishah said:"The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) used to perform Ghusl from a vessel which was the size of a Faraq [1] and he and I used to perform Ghusl using a single vessel." [1] Sixteen Ratls

chapter.ara-name: باب ذِكْرِ الْقَدْرِ الَّذِي يَكْتَفِي بِهِ الرَّجُلُ مِنَ الْمَاءِ لِلْغُسْلِ
chapter.eng-name: Mention Of How Much Water Is Sufficient For A Man To Perform Ghusl
